content: The power of #TanithTanith (Tanit) was the mother goddess of fertility and the moon. She was the patron goddess of Carthage and is related to Ishtar and Astarte.Today, the goddess Tanith remains revered in Ibiza and its ancient temple, a cave with an altar in the center, located on the road to Portinatx and designated "Cova de's Cuieram".Why Am I talking about a Goddess ‚ùì‚ùì‚ùìIn Ibiza the female energy is very important, as Tanith is part of our Island.
